title: Janet Street-Porter smacks Coleen Nolan for taking Keith Lemon joke too far
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Janet Street-Porter stood up and smacked Coleen Nolan on today's Loose Women after a joke went too far.

Keith Lemon was in the studio to discuss all things Celebrity Juice - and inevitably it ended in chaos when they went to play a game in the studio.

The cheeky prankster suggested they should play 'Don't Show Your Teeth' before turning to face Janet.

Keith then burst out laughing and grabbed hold of Coleen, who was also left in hysterics, while Janet had a face of thunder.

This did not go down well with furious Janet, who stood up out of her seat and shouted Coleen's name.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Giggling Coleen had her head in her hands when Janet stormed over across the desk and slapped her arm.

"Will you stop," cried out Janet, while Coleen rubbed her sore arm.

As she returned to her seat, Janet added: "You’re causing havoc."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Once everyone had calmed down, Keith asked if there Ruth Langsford if there was time for them to play the game.

"We haven't got time? You're such a tease," said Keith.

Ruth insisted they would not be able to play anything if he kept talking as she wrestled back control of the show.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

The Loose Women panel then joined Keith in playing a quick game of 'Name It On The Boogie'.

They had to wear noise cancelling headphones and guess what their teammate was dancing to.

Janet managed to correctly guess that Gloria Hunniford and Keith were saucily dancing to Rod Stewart's 'Da Ya Think I'm Sexy?'.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

It was then time for Coleen and Keith to shake their hips as they busted a move in the studio.

Ruth eventually managed to clock that the pair were gyrating to Shakira banger 'Hips Don't Lie'.

*Loose Women airs weekdays on ITV at 12.30pm
description: Loose Women panellist Coleen was left rubbing her arm after furious Janet stood up and slapped her
